articles.title: Indiana vs Illinois Predictions, Start Time, Odds: NCAAB Picks for Sunday, February 15 - Action Network
articles.description: Read for Indiana vs Illinois predictions, picks and odds for their college basketball game on Sunday, February 15.
articles.content:
The Indiana Hoosiers take on the Illinois Fighting Illini in Champaign, IL. Tip-off is set for 1 p.m. ET on CBS.
Illinois is favored by 10.5 points on the spread with a moneyline of -650. The total … [+4948 chars]
